name: advanced-azure-devops-pr-reviewer
description: Advanced Azure DevOps PR Reviewer using Azure OpenAI and LangGraph React agent

scripts.clean_build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run package
scripts.deploy_win_pat: powershell -Command "Get-Content .env | ForEach-Object { $name, $value = $_ -split '='; [System.Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable($name, $value) } ; npx tfx-cli extension publish -t $env:PAT"
scripts.build_deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy_win_pat

author: Advanced PR Reviewer Team
